title: Honour
body: How many honours do you need to get a badge? I have tons of honours and still no badge

replies.body: It depends on your summoner level and how many wins you have a how many honers you get from a match. On average about half your wins in honors will give you ribbon. If you get reported it resets.
99% sure my point disappear on a daily basis, I'll never see the ribbon :{

I had an honour badge for a while but it bugged out heaps. For about a week straight every time I logged in It would pop up saying you display great teamwork; the green honour badge. Then after maybe 5 games, it would disappear for no apparent reason. I never AFK'd any of those games that week, or displayed any foul behaviour, so I'm unsure as to what happened.
The more often you get honoured, the more chance you have of obtaining it. The more frequent, in the shorter amount of time, the more likely.
it is a percentage of honours in relation to games played. From what I have heard there is no magical number.
